From: "A.J. Gould" <black_panther_kitten@...>

 * Shadow Cat drops to the ground, dodging blasts and
missiles. She growled as pain shot up her spine. Her
injury began to spew out more mech-fluid as she rolled
over onto her stomach. groaning, she sat up slowly,
looking for Snow Tech, this was not there fight. They
had come here to look for Iron, not fight others
battles. Finding Iron was her first priority, but,
these, these BOTS had injured her, and that pissed her
off. She scanned the battle field, looking for Snow
Tech, but instead found Iron, in her new 2nd beast
mode. She grinned,*

 " Iron always knew how to pick 'em" *She muttered up
loud*

 * She got to her knees, she carefully crawled over to
a pair of bushes. She sat with her back to the bushes
and got out her little kit that she had with her.
opening it, she got out a pair of wrist-guns. They
where her favorite weapon and her most deadly. They
where tipped with a deadly virus that would immobilize
her victim and then slowly shuts them down. If they
where strong enough they would survive, if they
weren't,well...... She stood, scanning the field, she
saved these babies for emergencies, and this seemed to
be one. She saw that Tavatron was fighting two bots
named Hiss and Dark One. To her, one against two
wasn't fair, so, she targeted Hiss and fired one of
her darts. Not looking to see if it hit or not she ran
towards Iron, pushing her com-link as she went.*

 " Snow Tech, this is Shadow Cat, Try to get to Iron,
O.K.! I'll be there."

* She grinned, just like the old times, she thought.*

 * Snow Tech stood there, bored. He sighed, looking at
the battle, mabey he should help. Mabey. He looked
around and saw a really cute bot fighting off two
other bots. He frowned, it wasn't fair that it was two
against one! I mean, those two other bots might get
hurt! He chuckled at his lame joke, and pointed his
gun at the bot named Dark One and fired a fair sized
shot directly at his head. That ought to give her the
advantage, he thought. Then he heard his sisters
orders over his com-link.*

 " Yadda, yadda, yadda. Is that all she does is give
orders? Jezze!"

 * But he obediently walked towards the now noticeable
bot on the other side of the field, hoping that he
wouldn't get shot.*
